ua.chernov.taskmanager.transport

Class ServerTransport

  • java.lang.Object
    • ua.chernov.taskmanager.transport.Transport
      • ua.chernov.taskmanager.transport.ServerTransport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Manager.Subscriber

    public class ServerTransport
extends Transport
implements Manager.Subscriber
    Server-side transport. Subscriber methods -> Transport packets (current thread) Transport packets -> Room methods (separate thread)
